LanguageData.TKKN_PlantSunflower.label: giant sunflower
LanguageData.TKKN_PlantSunflower.description: A tall flower named because it turns its face to follow the sun.
LanguageData.TKKN_PlantTallGrasses.label: Tall Prairie Grasses
LanguageData.TKKN_PlantTallGrasses.description: A mix of hardy prairie grasses, like purple needlegrass, wild oats, foxtail, ryegrass, and buffalo grass.
LanguageData.TKKN_PlantTreeAcacia.label: umbrella thorn acacia tree
LanguageData.TKKN_PlantTreeAcacia.description: Hardy plant known to tolerate high alkalinity, drought, high temperatures, sandy and stony soils, strongly sloped rooting surfaces, and sand blasting.
LanguageData.TKKN_PlantTreeBaobab.label: baobab tree
LanguageData.TKKN_PlantTreeBaobab.description: Long lived tree that store water in their trunks.
LanguageData.TKKN_PlantTreeGum.label: gum tree
LanguageData.TKKN_PlantTreeGum.description: Smooth barked, fast growing tree that guzzles water and repells insects.
LanguageData.TKKN_PlantWildRice.label: wild rice plant
LanguageData.TKKN_PlantWildRice.description: Wild rice is hardy and grows in shallow water. It yeilds less rice than it's domesticated version.
